description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. **Dodge, Trigger, Destroy!**   Be the Fireball as you set off huge explosion combos across 8 waves and 5 unique challenges. Compare your scores to the best in the world using the online scoreboards.  Update 1.1 includes a new challenge, new music track, and other improvements.  Fireball is the fifth game in the radiangames series.
